name: part_009
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】猫又おかゆ 2nd Live ＂ぺるそにゃ～りすぺくと＂ 【 #おかゆセカンド 】 [NM7_uUOAOlI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Nekomata Okayu addresses the audience during an MC segment, joking about penlight colors.
The crowd cheers as the stage lights dim and transition music begins to play.
End card display for the free portion of the live stream with background music.

subtitles.original: 色を参考にしてみてください。
subtitles.english: Please use the colors as a reference.

subtitles.original: 遠くて見えづらい人は...
subtitles.english: For those who are too far away and find it hard to see...

subtitles.original: あんまりね、大きな声じゃ言えないですけど...
subtitles.english: I can't say this too loudly, but...

subtitles.original: とりあえず紫にしとけば
subtitles.english: If you just set it to purple for now,

subtitles.original: 間違いありません、本当に。
今日は色んな表情の僕を楽しんでいってください！
subtitles.english: please enjoy my many different expressions today!

subtitles.original: では、次の曲いきましょう！
subtitles.english: Now, let's move on to the next song!

subtitles.original: 無料パートは終了いたしました。ご視聴ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: The sneak peek part of the show has ended. Thank you for watching!
